item.title: The Runnings- fly tipping, 30th November
item.description:
Spotted during today’s Swindon Village volunteers’ litter pick. Fly tipping along the roadside verge and bank of River Swilgate. Old chair and packaging. Sufficient attached documentation to persue the person involved. See photograph

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Runnings Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Duplicate signs and traffic lights, 30th November
item.description:
I think someone has duplicated the order for roadworks signs and temporary lights! The lights are also not in synq, causing a lot of confusion for all road users.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
